question:
All the members of which of the following committees come from Lok Sabha only?
  1. Committee on Estimates
  2. Committee on Public Accounts
  3. Committee on Public Undertakings
Select the correct option from options given below:
explanation: The members of the committee on estimates consist of 30 members who are drawn entirely from the Lok Sabha. The term of the committee is one year. The committee on public accounts and public undertakings consists of 15 members elected by the Lok Sabha and 7 members of the Rajya Sabha are associated with it.
